    Website Launched!

    Sep 6, 2015

    Looks like our website is up and running! If it isn’t, then you shouldn’t be seeing this.

    We decided to go with Jekyll for our web needs since it’s easy to get up and running and can be hosted on GitHub Pages. I found this nice clean theme at Jekyll Themes.

    – Cyril Casapao
